reviews.review_text: This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from traditional therapy to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 12 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from fitness training to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The ethical boundaries module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 6 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 2 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the client journey map from Module 4. Now charging $150 per session vs $78 before. Game changer.

I've taken 7 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had built a waitlist. The community support was incredible too.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The advanced protocols module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 9 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 1 month after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the session structure from Module 2. Now charging $229 per session vs $85 before. Game changer.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from traditional therapy to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. I've taken 8 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had doubled my rates. The community support was incredible too.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the session templates templates alone saved me 24 hours of work. Closed 7 new clients in 6 weeks using the pitch framework from Module 3. Already made back 5x my investment.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The clear explanations made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied progress tracker with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 98% in 2 months. Worth every penny.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from teaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The advanced protocols module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 8 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
